About

A tech enthusiast with 3+ years of software engineering experience, I architect robust microservices, data pipelines, and AI innovations using Java, Python, and cloud technologies. I thrive on exploring emerging technologies like LangChain and blockchain, constantly building projects that push boundaries and solve real-world problems. In the software industry one of the few fields where yesterday's expertise becomes tomorrow's legacy I embrace the exhilarating challenge of continuous learning. When I'm not crafting code or optimizing databases, you'll find me passionately debating Formula 1 race strategies or improving my tennis backhand. My secret superpower? As an accomplished public speaker and orator, I derive immense satisfaction from helping others find their voice and conquer stage fright, turning nervous presenters into confident communicators.

Projects

AudioProctorSystem

An AI-powered audio proctoring system that detects academic integrity violations during exams by analyzing spoken content in real-time. This innovative solution eliminates the need for human proctors while maintaining robust exam security.

Python LangChain OpenAI FastAPI Docker

MicrosoftCodeFundoProject

An award-winning blockchain voting system project developed for the Microsoft CodeFundo Hackathon. This secure and transparent voting solution addresses limitations of traditional Electronic Voting Machines through innovative blockchain technology.

View Project

A sophisticated time series analysis tool implementing advanced pattern recognition techniques for automatically labeling complex multivariate time series data, significantly reducing manual annotation efforts.
